# searchTermsOperator

**Instance Property**

The operator that defines how to incorporate the search terms when performing the search.

## Declaration

```swift
var searchTermsOperator: INConditionalOperator { get }
```

## Discussion

This property indicates whether photos must contain all, some, or none of the terms listed in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForPhotosIntent/searchTerms] property.

## Getting the Search Terms

- **searchTerms**: An array of terms to look for in the photos.
